bug.author: AnandAron
bug.summary: Session.run() doesn't accepts string of image bytes(2nd Parameter), as it usually does
bug.description:
System information*
Os Ubuntu Tensorflow 1.13.1 Python 2.7 Code: image_data = tf.gfile.FastGFile(image_path, 'rb').read() prediction = sess.run('final_result:0', {'Placeholder:0': image_data})
Error: could not convert string to float

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/AnandAron>@AnandAron</denchmark-link> Could you provide a code to reproduce the bug? Thanks!
